caption.p: PTIO radical scavenging effects of pomelo essential oils. ( A) Evolution of absorbance when reacted with 10% and 50% dilutions of CPEO or DEO; ( B) scavenging rate of ascorbic acid, CPEO, DEO and D-limonene. Droplines indicate the 50% clearance of PTIO and the corresponding ED50 of each sample.
